mapper.insert: insert report (id, name, aid, rpttype, mid, did, uid, logic, description, createdTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{aid}, #{reportType}, #{mid}, #{did}, #{uid}, #{logic}, #{description},now())
mapper.select: select id, name, aid, rpttype as reportType, mid, did, uid, logic, description, createdTime from report, app, member, datasource,model where app.id=report.aid and member.id=report.uid and datasource.id=report.did and model.id=report.mid report.id = #{id}
select report.id as appId, report.name as reportName, report.rpttype as reportType, logic from report, app where report.aid = app.id and app.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update report set rpttype=#{reportType} where id = #{id}
